name: cdn_properties
description: FastEdge CDN application for integration tests - property access control

scripts.build:all: npm-run-all -p build:invalid-method-write build:valid-path-write build:valid-url-write build:valid-host-write build:valid-query-write build:invalid-scheme-write build:invalid-geolocation-write build:valid-response-status-read build:invalid-response-status-write build:valid-nginx-log-write build:valid-readonly-read build:invalid-readonly-write
scripts.copy:all: npm-run-all -p copy:invalid-method-write copy:valid-path-write copy:valid-url-write copy:valid-host-write copy:valid-query-write copy:invalid-scheme-write copy:invalid-geolocation-write copy:valid-response-status-read copy:invalid-response-status-write copy:valid-nginx-log-write copy:valid-readonly-read copy:invalid-readonly-write
scripts.copy:invalid-method-write: npx cross-env NAME=invalid-method-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:valid-path-write: npx cross-env NAME=valid-path-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:valid-url-write: npx cross-env NAME=valid-url-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:valid-host-write: npx cross-env NAME=valid-host-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:valid-query-write: npx cross-env NAME=valid-query-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:invalid-scheme-write: npx cross-env NAME=invalid-scheme-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:invalid-geolocation-write: npx cross-env NAME=invalid-geolocation-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:valid-response-status-read: npx cross-env NAME=valid-response-status-read npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:invalid-response-status-write: npx cross-env NAME=invalid-response-status-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:valid-nginx-log-write: npx cross-env NAME=valid-nginx-log-write npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:valid-readonly-read: npx cross-env NAME=valid-readonly-read npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:invalid-readonly-write: npx cross-env NAME=invalid-readonly-write npm run mv:file
